title: Lalber chuan ruai theh a peih ta e
lyrics:
Lalber chuan ruai theh a peih ta e,
Hmun a awm, kil turte sawm la;
Aw, rawn khawm la, a in lo khat sela,
Riltam leh retheiten kil se.

Lamlianah leh daiahte chhuak la,
Sual kawng thim tak zingahte chuan;
Kal la, kal la, ngilnei tak chungin,
Vakvaite rawn hruai lut rawh.

Hmun a la awm, rawn khawm leh langin,
Mahse, min pawisa lutu leh
Sawmna ngaithla duh lotute zawng chu,
Tu man an sawm leh tawh lo vang.

Hmun a la awm, rawn khawm leh langin,
Pathianin thu a pe a che;
Aw, zahngaihna huangah rawn khawm langin,
Chhandamtu hmangaihnaah chuan.

Lungngai, riangvai leh hausate tan,
Vanah khian hmun a la awm e;
Aw, rawn khawm leh la, kawng an khar hma khian,
Thahnemngaiin hrilh vel ang che.

Aw, van ruai dar a lo ri dawn e,
Ram thianghlim lo thlen dawn vang khian;
Lei hi lungngaih, rum, tamin a buai ta,
Haw r'u, keinin I sawm ve ang.

Kawng khar hma khian rawn inpeih ula,
Tam, lungngai, rum, vakvai te saw,
An Lalpa sawmna thu chu hrilhin,
Van ruai thehah I sawm ang.
